name: Robotics in VR
description: Become an inventor and expert in robotics! Construct, program, play.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later, or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i7 4th Generation equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 Storage: 4 GB available space
